players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and found evidence that he's the killer."
You: "Bob, I don't think Charlie is the mafioso. He was acting suspiciously last night when Diana died."
Charlie: "Bob, I think you're just trying to distract us from your own guilt. You were acting suspiciously last night too."
